app_detail:
Face detection using the most powerful tools - cloud computing. ğŸ¥°
Easy to use, Beauty Curiosity is able to calculate the face proportions and golden ratio in less then one minute.

Beauty Curiosity uses three different symmetry analysis algorithms. 

We detect and display the mood, age, gender and facial details - beard or eye glasses.

You can use a selfie, take a picture, or browse your gallery for your portrait. ğŸˆ

Easy beauty test. Fast beauty test. Beauty test done right, based on newest tests on face analysis.

No one is perfect, but based on real symmetry analysis, if the beauty test score is over 95%, you are one of the most beautiful 1% people in the world.

Warning! Note that if your result scores <60% you might want to see a stomatologist, because you might have serious mandibular issues. 

Warning 2! Please DO NOT use this beauty test if you have confidence issues or low self-esteem.
